msg: TRINIDAD-2219 Negative numbers for Bidi/RTL languages are not handled correctly

author: marvin
msg: Use anonymous XSUB instead of named XS.
Err#trap blindly runs an the supplied C function pointer.  It is best if
we do not expose such functionality via Perl, so use an anonymous XSUB
accessible only via a static variable to run the supplied routine in a
Perl context instead of a named XSUB.
